casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Ludlow Ray DAW, Jr. No. 5P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019

William D. Spence, Attorney at Law, Kinston, Ludlow Ray Daw, Jr., For Daw, Ludlow Ray (Jr.)

Joseph E. Herrin, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina *414ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd of January 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
